text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a security interest in a cooperative interest shall attach, be perfected, and be enforceable as provided in Title 9 of the Commercial Law Article.
The security interest may be perfected by the secured party's taking possession of the membership certificate or by filing a financing statement as provided in Title 9 of the Commercial Law Article.
On request of a secured party, the cooperative housing corporation shall note on its books and records the interest of the secured party in the cooperative interest.
